title: Shadowheart
content:
Failing some will actually earn disapproval from her. Dislikes Lae'zel and most of her opinions and ideas. As a worshipper of Shar and also by default a Cleric of the Trickery Domain. Following her principles of secrecy, indirect approach, and deceit as a consistent principle is a good way of gaining approval with Shadowheart.

Check out our Companion Guide for all compiled approval instances
